FuncDef: This command enables ECMP and configures the number of routes for path sharing; for example, the value 2 means two equal cost routes will be used for cost sharing.

ParaDef.Info: The maximum number of equal cost routes allowed on this routing table instance, expressed as a decimal integer. Setting ECMP max-ecmp-routes to 1 yields the same result as entering no ecmp. Values-0 to 64.
